content: 12 football team colors square skill level easy materials worsted weight yarn 100 yds each of 3 colors colors a b c sample shown in color a orange color b white color c navy blue note for sample i used yarn from stash red heart soft in navy and white and red heart super saver in orange i would recommend using one type of yarn for all three colors so you don t get size variations between row e g rhss is thicker than rh soft size h/8 5 mm crochet hook or size needed for gauge tapestry needle gauge 14 sts & 8 row = 4 in half_double_crochet on size h/8 5 mm hook note finished square should measure about 12 if you find your square is getting too big by round 12 you can take out a couple rounds between rnds 13-16 before you work the long single_crochet round round 17 you can also skip the long single_crochet round and work one final round of plain single_crochet pattern notes square is worked from center out in joined rounds do not turn at end of each round but continue in same direction throughout entire square cut and join colors as directed terms/abbreviations back loop only blo beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet each ea half double_crochet half_double_crochet long single_crochet long single_crochet round round single_crochet single_crochet remaining rem repeat repeat slip sl slip_stitch slip_stitch stitch st square note do not turn at twice join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 you should have a square with four 3-double_crochet groups like the first round of a basic granny square 12 double_crochet do not turn on this or
